articles.author: Monika Pašukonytė
articles.title: Folks React To Domino's Pizza Closing Its Doors To The Last Store In Italy After Failing To Impress Locals - Bored Panda
articles.description: Netizens react to Domino’s Pizza closing its doors to the last store in Italy.
